tossup_question: 17) MATH  In addition to writing questions, the high schoolers also need to sort the 7 competing teams into a division of 3 and a division of 4. However, teams A and B refuse to be placed in the same division, and team B must be placed with team C. How many ways are there to divide the teams up?
bonus_question: 17) MATH  Which of the following polynomials is not divisible by x − 11?
